title: Tender for Supply of 200,000 Vials of Meropenem Injection 1g Vial & 185,000 Vials of Meropenem Injection 500mg Vial
decision_details:
- the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health, to award the supply of the 25% of the quantities of the two items referred to above as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC) and as indicated below, was approved by the Cabinet: 

		*	Meropenem Injection 1g Vial - 50,000 vials; and

		*	Meropenem Injection 500mg Vial - 46,250 vials.
